A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1st 40 minutes were good\, then it falls off a cliff. Too many issues to list\, but when you actively root for some \"good guys\" to die & for the film to end (how many endings can 1 film have??) it's not good. Blame JJ & Kennedy for creating an uninspired \"saga\" - you set a bad course and can't abandon this junk now! How is this getting 93% on RT???
